name: panoptes
description: Test visualization platform for the testing pyramid

scripts.build:packages: bun run build:shared && bun run build:reporters && bun run build:cli
scripts.build:reporters: bun run --cwd packages/reporters/vitest build && bun run --cwd packages/reporters/playwright build
scripts.ci: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test && bun run build
